name: Stunning Assault
description: You powerful but imprecise attacks can stun your enemies.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +16
benefit: You can choose to take a â€“5 penalty on all melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to stun targets you hit with your melee attacks for 1 round. A successful Fortitude save negates the effect. The DC of this save is 10 + your base attack bonus. You must choose to use this feat before making the attack roll, and its effects last until your next turn.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to end the effects of this feat at the end of your turn instead of the start of your next turn.
